snippet: With their a 4-0 victory over the visiting Devils on Sunday, the Islanders extended their winning streak to 10 games without a regulation loss.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat New Jersey Devils, 4-0; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: With their a 4-0 victory over the visiting Devils on Sunday, the Islanders extended their winning streak to 10 games without a regulation loss.

headline.print_headline: Islanders Top Devils to Move Into Second
headline.main: Islanders Top Devils to Move Into Second
